__TOC__

* Contact: Glen Duncan Scott (No Longer Supported)
* Brand: Toshiba 
* Make : Satellite Pro
* Model: A100
* Website: <nowiki>[[http://uk.computers.toshiba-europe.com/cgi-bin/ToshibaCSG/jsp/productPage.do?service=UK&PRODUCT_ID=115309&DISC_MODEL=0&toshibaShop=true|www.toshiba.com]]</nowiki>

=== Current Issues ===
* <nowiki>[[http://acpi.sourceforge.net/|ACPI]]</nowiki> Errors 
* Unfortunately OpenGL appears unstable for R200 cards.
* Phoenix BIOS hardware not supported by <nowiki>[[http://www.fnfx.sourceforge.net/|Fnfx]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[http://www.buzzard.me.uk/toshiba/index.html|Toshiba Linux Utilities]]</nowiki>
* Battery life operation significantly reduced (1 hr 16 mins) compared to Windows (2 hrs).

==== Notes ====

ATI Radeon® Xpress 200M
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Dapper_Installation_Guide|Installation Guide]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ati.com/support/driver.html|Driver]]</nowiki>

Wi-Fi® 802.11b/g integrated Wireless LAN (Atheros Communications Inc.) 
* Requires net5211.inf Windows driver file and don't forget to turn hardware switch on! Activation command 

<pre>
$sudo dhclient ath0
</pre>

* <nowiki>[[http://ndiswrapper.sourceforge.net/mediawiki/index.php/Installation|Installation Guide]]</nowiki>

Xgl/Compiz (ATI) - Experimental - Works but missing window headers.
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Xgl-Compiz-Dapper|Installation Guide]]</nowiki>

'''Synaptic Package Manager'''

'''System>Administration>Synaptic Package Manager''' to install these additional programs. 

'''Educational''' 
* <nowiki>[[http://www.bibletime.info/|bibletime]]</nowiki> - KJV Bible and commentary
* <nowiki>[[http://www.shatters.net/celestia/|celestia]]</nowiki> - Real-time visual space simulation
* <nowiki>[[http://www.stellarium.org/|stellarium]]</nowiki> - Real-time photo-realistic sky generator
* <nowiki>[[http://www.usermode.org/code.html|qbrew]]</nowiki> - Homebrewer's recipe calculator

'''Games'''
* <nowiki>[[http://www.armagetronad.net|armagetron]]</nowiki> - 3D Tron-like high speed game
* chromium - Scrolling space shooter 
* <nowiki>[[http://www.frozen-bubble.org/|frozen-bubble]]</nowiki> - Pop the bubbles
* ksokoban - Mental puzzles

'''Graphics''' 
* <nowiki>[[http://www.blender.org/|blender]]</nowiki> - Very fast and versatile 3D modeller/renderer
* <nowiki>[[http://www.inkscape.org/|inkscape]]</nowiki> - Vector Graphics Editor

'''Internet'''
* <nowiki>[[http://ddclient.sourceforge.net/|ddclient]]</nowiki> - Update dynamic IP address at DynDNS.org. <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Dapper#How_to_setup_a_LoJack_system_for_your_laptop|Lojack]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ethereal.com/|ethereal]]</nowiki> - Network analysis tool
* <nowiki>[[http://www.fs-security.com/|firestarter]]</nowiki> - Firewall
* <nowiki>[[http://www.adobe.com/|flashplugin-nonfree]]</nowiki> - Macromedia Flash plugin
* <nowiki>[[http://gaim-encryption.sourceforge.net/|gaim-encryption]]</nowiki> - Encryption plugin for Gaim
* <nowiki>[[http://gmail-notify.sourceforge.net/|gmail-notify]]</nowiki> - Email alert
* <nowiki>[[http://earth.google.com/|googleearth]]</nowiki> - Satellite earth imagery application
* <nowiki>[[http://www.mozilla.com/thunderbird/|mozilla-thunderbird]]</nowiki> - Email client
* <nowiki>[[http://enigmail.mozdev.org/|mozilla-thunderbird-enigmail]]</nowiki> - GPG support for Mozilla Thunderbird
* <nowiki>[[http://www.java.com/|sun-java5-jre]]</nowiki> - Runtime environment
* <nowiki>[[http://www.java.com/|sun-java5-plugin]]</nowiki> - Firefox plugin
* <nowiki>[[http://www.xchat.org/xchat|xchat]]</nowiki> - Internet Relay Chat 
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ekiga.org/|ekiga]]</nowiki> - Internet Telephony

'''Office''' 
* <nowiki>[[http://www.adobe.com/|acroread]]</nowiki> - Acrobat reader and Firefox plugin
* <nowiki>[[http://www.gnucash.org/|gnucash]]</nowiki> - Accounting
* <nowiki>[[http://www.scribus.net/|scribus]]</nowiki> - Publishing

'''Programming''' 
* <nowiki>[[http://www.nvu.com/|nvu]]</nowiki> - Web Authoring System
* <nowiki>[[http://quanta.kdewebdev.org/|quantaplus]]</nowiki> - Web Authoring System

'''Sound and Video''' 
* <nowiki>[[http://amarok.kde.org/|amarok]]</nowiki> - Media Player
* <nowiki>[[http://audacity.sourceforge.net/|audacity]]</nowiki> - Multimedia Editing
* <nowiki>[[http://www.getdemocracy.com/|democracyplayer]]</nowiki> - Internet TV Player
* <nowiki>[[http://www.k3b.org/|k3b]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://lame.sourceforge.net/|lame]]</nowiki>, libk3b2-mp3 - Rip an Audio CD into MP3, ISO, CD/DVD burning software
* <nowiki>[[http://www.kinodv.org/|kino]]</nowiki> - Multimedia Editing
* libdvdcss2 - DVD Decryption 
* libxine-extracodecs - Multimedia Codecs i.e. Quicktime  
* <nowiki>[[http://www.gnome.org/projects/totem/|totem-xine]]</nowiki> - Media Player and Firefox plugin 
* <nowiki>[[http://www.videolan.org/vlc/|vlc]]</nowiki> - Media Player for unusual formats
* w32codecs - Multimedia audio and video codecs

'''System Tools'''
* <nowiki>[[http://kitenet.net/programs/alien/|alien]]</nowiki> - Install non-native packages with dpkg
* build-essential - Enables building of Debian packages
* <nowiki>[[http://www.marzocca.net/linux/bum.html|bum]]</nowiki> - Boot-Up Manager for easy configuration of startup and shutdown scripts and services
* <nowiki>[[http://corefonts.sourceforge.net/|msttcorefonts]]</nowiki> - Microsoft fonts
* <nowiki>[[http://ndiswrapper.sourceforge.net/|ndiswrapper]]</nowiki> - Installs Windows drivers for network cards. 
* xorg-driver-fglrx - Video driver for ATI graphics accelerators

<nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=140920|System Cleanup Guide]]</nowiki>
